answer.text: Before running any UnifyWeaver code, you must initialize the Prolog environment by loading init.pl. This sets up the module search paths so that use_module(unifyweaver(...)) works correctly.

code_blocks.code:
# Interactive session with UnifyWeaver environment
swipl -f init.pl

# Run a specific goal and exit
swipl -f init.pl -g "use_module(unifyweaver(targets/python_target)), halt"

% What init.pl does:
% 1. Determines project root from init.pl location
% 2. Sets up file_search_path(unifyweaver, '.../src/unifyweaver')
% 3. Adds src/ to library_directory

% After loading init.pl, you can:
?- use_module(unifyweaver(targets/python_target)).
?- use_module(unifyweaver(core/firewall)).

verification.failure_message: Could not initialize. Make sure you're in the UnifyWeaver project root.

answer.text: UnifyWeaver uses Prolog's file_search_path mechanism to locate modules. After loading init.pl, the 'unifyweaver' search path points to src/unifyweaver/, allowing you to load any module with use_module(unifyweaver(path/to/module)).

code_blocks.code:
% The unifyweaver search path is set up by init.pl:
:- asserta(user:file_search_path(unifyweaver, '/path/to/src/unifyweaver')).

% This allows loading modules like:
:- use_module(unifyweaver(targets/python_target)).
:- use_module(unifyweaver(core/service_validation)).
:- use_module(unifyweaver(glue/network_glue)).
:- use_module(unifyweaver(sources/csv_source)).

verification.failure_message: Module path not set. Load init.pl first.

answer.text: UnifyWeaver's source code is organized under src/unifyweaver/ with four main directories: targets/ (code generators for Python, Go, Rust, etc.), core/ (validation, firewall, services), glue/ (cross-language integration), and sources/ (data source handlers for CSV, JSON, XML, etc.).

code_blocks.code:
src/unifyweaver/
├── targets/           # Code generators
│   ├── python_target.pl
│   ├── go_target.pl
│   ├── rust_target.pl
│   ├── csharp_target.pl
│   └── bash_target.pl
├── core/              # Core functionality
│   ├── service_validation.pl
│   ├── firewall.pl
│   └── transitive_closure.pl
├── glue/              # Cross-language glue
│   ├── network_glue.pl
│   └── pipe_glue.pl
└── sources/           # Data sources
    ├── csv_source.pl
    ├── json_source.pl
    └── xml_source.pl
